greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the decimal concatenation of n and n^2.
reference: Felice Russo, A set of new Smarandache functions, sequences and conjectures in number theory, American Research Press 2000
formula: a(n) ~ n^3. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 19 2012
program: (MAGMA) [Seqint(Intseq(n^2) cat Intseq(n)): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 03 2015
results.author: _Felice Russo_, Feb 25 2000
ext: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Feb 28 2000
